customer_alternatives_subtitle: Select alternative products for unavailable items in your order.
customer_orders_subtitle: View and manage your orders here.
customer_catalog_subtitle: Browse our products and add them to your cart.
customer_dashboard_welcome_message: Welcome to your dashboard! From here you can browse the store, manage your orders and communication preferences.
set_your_communication_preferences_below: Set your communication preferences below to stay informed about your order status.

form.telephone_invalid: Please enter a valid telephone number
form.address_invalid: Please select a valid address from the suggestions

you_will_receive_a_confirmation_email_so: We will keep you up to date with your order status via push notifications and via phone.
error_quantity_greater: The picked quantity is greater than the ordered quantity. Please select at most as many as ordered.
error_quantity_smaller: The picked quantity is smaller than the ordered quantity.

select_alternatives.title: Select Alternatives
select_alternatives.select_some_first: Select at least one product to search nearby

search_for_alternative_product_dialog.title: Search for alternatives to
search_for_alternative_product_dialog.no_products_found_description: Try adjusting your search or filter to find what you're looking for.

search_for_alternative_recipe_dialog.title: Alternative Recipes
search_for_alternative_recipe_dialog.error_retry: Something went wrong — please try again later.

name: Name
check_order: Please check your order and contact information.
alternative_product: Choose an alternative product to use if an item becomes unavailable.
get_notified: Get notified if there are any issues while fulfilling your order.
automatic_contact: Kevin will only be able to contact you automatically if you enter contact information!

order_packed.title: Your order has been packed!
order_packed.body: Your order {{orderId}} was packed successfully and is now on its way to you.

missing_items.title: Your order has missing items
missing_items.body: Some items were not available for your order {{orderId}}. Click on this notification to select alternatives.

warehouse_dashboard_welcome_message: This application accompanies warehouse staff while picking products to fulfill customer orders. It also shows them warnings about customer orders that need attention.
warehouse_orders_subtitle: This overview shows warehouse staff which products to pick so they can fulfill customer orders. While picking, they need to enter information about missing items.
warehouse_order_picking_subtitle: Pick items for the selected order and confirm availabilities.
warehouse_order_picking_confirmation_sub: You have picked less than the customer ordered for these products. Please confirm to automatically notify the customer, based on their communication preference.
warehouse_warnings_subtitle: View warnings about product availabilities and other issues that need attention.
warnings_empty_subtitle: Everything is fine, no warnings were reported.
